originalText.text: Started coming to YogaSpark about a year ago after some yoga experience, and my practice has greatly benefited from frequenting this studio. The staff and instructors are super friendly and informative.  The facility is always clean and the locker rooms are well stocked so you can go about your day after a really sweaty sesh. The cool tea tree oil face towel at the end of the practice is also a nice touch. This studio is a safe space for beginners but also presents challenges for those who are more advanced. My personal favorite instructor would have to be Ariel, but all of the instructors are worth checking out and bring their own flair and expertise with their flows. You honestly canâ€™t go wrong with any of them. I highly recommend this studio!

originalText.text: This is my favorite yoga studio in the city. The front desk is very nice, and the instructors that teach here are great. I usually go to morning classes and today I had Ariel as an instructor, she was great! Highly recommend checking this place out :)

text.text: This is my favorite yoga studio in the city. The front desk is very nice, and the instructors that teach here are great. I usually go to morning classes and today I had Ariel as an instructor, she was great! Highly recommend checking this place out :)

originalText.text: My favorite spot for hot yoga! The energy is always great and I love the repetition of each flow starting slow and working toward a new movement with each breath. Plus they have a spacious locker room with plenty of showers, towels and shampoo/conditioner included.

text.text: My favorite spot for hot yoga! The energy is always great and I love the repetition of each flow starting slow and working toward a new movement with each breath. Plus they have a spacious locker room with plenty of showers, towels and shampoo/conditioner included.

originalText.text: My favorite yoga studio- best instructors and clean facility . Classes  are easy to follow and yet challenging.
